passages.text:
Congratulations for killing Vanessa the Vespa
[[Thank you]]
passages.name: fourth level story

passages.text:
I have an interesting story about her…
She is one of the 3 primordial bugs of this age.
[[Primordial?]]
[[Are there any others?]]
passages.name: Thank you

passages.text:
Yeah, the three Primordial ones,  Vanessa, who you already meet, Rafaela the Rainha Formiga and Cecilia the Centopeia.
[[And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?]]

links.name: And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?
links.link: And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?

passages.name: Primordial?

passages.text:
You must fight against another two, Rafaela the Rainha Formiga and Cecilia the Centopeia.
[[And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?]]

links.name: And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?
links.link: And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?

passages.name: Are there any others?

passages.text:
No, they will be much harder.
[[Oh no…]]
passages.name: And would they be as difficult as Vanessa?

passages.text:
But there is a reason for all of that, Their strength comes from the terrifying bug that made it with you.
[[I though I was…]]
passages.name: Oh no…

passages.text:
I know, but something remained in you, after you killed it, some part of the bug’s soul  embedded with yours.
[[You mean that I’m half-]]
passages.name: I though I was…

passages.text:
It was not enough for this, but I know he used part of you to create the primordial.
[[...]]
passages.name: You mean that I’m half-

passages.text:
When someone bring the bugs back, he started with those 3
And from they, all the other bugs where generated, as a mix of its parts
[[How do you know that much?->Do you know who created them?]]
[[Do you know who created them?]]

links.name: How do you know that much?
links.link: Do you know who created them?

links.name: Do you know who created them?
links.link: Do you know who created them?

passages.text:
... It doesn’t matter now...
Whoever has done it has already paid the consequences
[[Do you think he is alive?]]

links.name: Do you think he is alive?
links.link: Do you think he is alive?

passages.name: Do you know who created them?

passages.text:
Let’s stop talking about it, please…
[[Okay...]]
passages.name: Do you think he is alive?

passages.text:
gold bug poe .(‡18))‡( ?)8) :‡?
[[Who are you? what are those messagers?->END]]

links.name: Who are you? what are those messagers?

passages.name: Okay...

passages.name: END
